base.string: You should create app and get some keys. Tick `Web API` checkbox. | Option | Value | | ------------- | ------------- | | App name | *Anything* | | App description | *Anything* | | Redirect URIs | http://localhost:44444/ | | Which API/SDKs are you planning to use? | Web API |
You should create project on Dashboard. After add OAuth key on Auth page. Add yourself on Audience page to test users.
